entry.title: Ghost of You
entry.summary:
Author: krono20112025

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 38,828Chapters: 22/30Kudos: 68

Summary: Marinette Dupain-Cheng arrived in Gotham, trying to escape her fractured past. She got a job in a café, and things remained simple; until he came along. Damian Wayne. Cold. Arrogant. Rude. And yet, captivating. Damian al Ghul Wayne simply wants an espresso, yet he’s confronted by a fangirl, who is verging on being a stalker, Wait. Why is she phasing through the wall? What's in Goliath's Beard is Happening?

entry.title: Tangled in Claws & Stars
entry.summary:
Author: vixenwithaplot

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 56,172Chapters: 36/50Kudos: 97

Summary: Gotham never slept.Its skyline cut sharp against clouds, alive with whispers of shadows and secrets.Somewhere beneath that pulse, a girl arrived—carrying dreams, sketches, and the faint echo of a world she left behind.She didn’t know it yet, but her presence tugged at the city itself, stirring currents unseen.Across the streets, a boy moved through shadows, precise and silent, trained to see everything yet notice nothing… until now.He didn’t see her. Not yet.But the air changed where she walked.A thread of magic hummed between worlds, delicate yet unbreakable.Destiny had begun to weave.Two souls, bound by threads, claws, and stars,were about to meet.And the city, as always, watched.

entry.title: The Night the Truth came to Gotham
entry.summary:
Author: krono20112025

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 13,918Chapters: 10/24Kudos: 58

Summary: Lila Rossi saw herself as a genius, a top-tier manipulator navigating the Parisian high school scene. Then she landed in Gotham. Crippled by jet lag and nightmares forecasting her public ruin, Lila sees her malicious lies might be her undoing. This city doesn’t have time for a miraculous liar; it’s got actual villains. Suddenly, dodging the chilly gaze of the youngest Wayne is a lot scarier than avoiding Marinette. Turns out, trying to scheme in the city of the Batman is a one-way ticket to getting fully, hilariously exposed.   Maribat Nonsense November Prompt Time-Loop

entry.title: I Got Isekai’d Into Miraculous—Now They Want Me to Break the Love-Square?! Tch. I’m a Robin. I’ll Fix It My Way.
entry.summary:
Author: krono20112025

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 120,515Chapters: 44/60Kudos: 356

Summary: Five years Damian waited for the last Miraculous Ladybug manga, and the ending sucks. Enraged, he boasted he could write a better story. A mischievous, fourth-dimensional imp quickly appears and gives him a chance to prove his claim. To prevent a disappointing ending, he must change the plot as he sees fit. What would a genius detective, Robin, do in the MLB Universe, to cause Chaos of course! ​He wakes up in a world where he is dead, but Alfred is his living ally. With just seven days until the plot kicks off, Damian dedicates himself to healing the fractured Batfamily, slowly putting the pieces back together. But he can multitask. To prevent the Love Square, he decides to aggressively befriend Marinette Dupain-Cheng the only way a Wayne knows how: by replacing her friends with competent ones and burying her under a mountain of gifts. Who knew purchasing platonic affection required so much cashmere?

entry.title: We're not acquaintances! (That's good, I'd rather be more)
entry.summary:
Author: Fangirl_Who_Died

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 5,155Chapters: 6/23Kudos: 182

Summary: Tim Drake-Wayne was known for consuming an unholy (and illegal) amount of coffee. Tim Drake-Wayne was also known for bonding with people over coffee. Unfortunately (or fortunately, depending on who you ask) one of those people happened to be Marinette Dupain-Cheng. “...Wait, did you just say Marine-?” (Ah, cue Damian reminding me that this daminette I'm writing. Hold on, pretty boy, this is slowwww burn.) Or Tim brought a French girl home. Said girl can tame even the most wild pets, and can be be calm in the face of Damian holding a katana to her neck. Wait wha- (Rewrote the summary cuz chapter 2 changed the scene)

entry.title: My Chat Was Actually a Bat?
entry.summary:
Author: BluCl0ud

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 17,055Chapters: 5/25Kudos: 73

Summary: They say the Universe sends its best guardians in the form of small animals. Whether it be man's best friend or a prideful ancient god that enters one’s life. Slowly, one begins to heal by the mere existence of a loving pet to come home to. Ladybug has certainly seen better days, so what becomes of her life when a strangely affectionate black cat comes to burrow its way into her exhausted heart?   TLDR:Damian is often described as a black cat in many fics, he even became one in an official comic release (partially). So I will make him a cat but with lore.

entry.title: The after effects of An Akuma.
entry.summary:
Author: Fateofwar

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 26,862Chapters: 10/?Kudos: 357

Summary: The idea for this work goes to Lilavaporizer9000, some part might be similar.I have little knowing of The DC world as compared to the Heralds and enforcers reading this fanfic. Some characters might be ooc, and if you find any case do tell.And English is not my first language, so any mistake or error is purely due to intervention of the keyboard and my spite for the language if I have any. So, Damian Wayne needs a girlfriend. His family won't stop pestering him with a normal teen life, not after he told them it would be better to spend 24 hours in the asylum rather than in this place where everyone seems to be losing their brain cells.A normal girlfriend would shut them better than anything. Which proved more difficult than solving criminal cases and fighting a Superman with a kryptonite dagger.The second option is find a small group of humans to meet his needs. Which seems impossible considering his general distain for them, as Dick calls it. He is one for sure.Luckily there is a match. Marinette Dupin-Cheng. She’s intelligent, quiet, respectful of his boundaries— generally acceptable.

entry.title: Énouement
entry.summary:
Author: sunshine_and_symphonies

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 44,694Chapters: 4/5Kudos: 294

Summary: There are secrets in the world that are too great for any one person to bear. As Marinette's friends band together around her in the wake of yet another upheaval, Marinette grapples with the never ending chaos that seems to trail after her, and Damian tries to shield her from the wake of a storm. Still, the echos of what have been clash with the whispers of what will be.   In which Damian and Marinette meet the final tangled threads of their histories, hand in hand.

entry.title: Heirs
entry.summary:
Author: otome_wandering

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 333,774Chapters: 23/78Kudos: 2,123

Summary: Marinette is the Star of the Order of the Miraculous, the still-in-training head, as well as the True Ladybug leading the Court of Miracles. After years at Hawkmoth's mercy, Marinette has decided that enough is enough and is reaching out to Batman, the detective of detectives to help her track down the villian's true identity. What better way to do this than a field trip to Gotham? Damian, the bloodson and heir to both the Cowl and the Demon's Head, wants nothing to do with the French Class who has won the Wayne Enterprises Summer Internship, yet his father insists he needs better interpersonal skills. He supposes it won't kill him to try to work with this supposedly skilled class president if it means that everyone will get off his back for being 'aggressively asocial' (although he will still keep NDAs on standby). A seal of fate, a blood right, and a hidden prophecy lead Marinette and Damian on a rollercoaster of emotions, humourous misunderstandings, comeuppance -- and marriage?! ___Basically my attempt at a soulmate AU, full of just about every Damianette cliche and trope I can think of. And some original lore to make it work. Updating Monthly Maribat Awards 2024 Winner

entry.title: The last thing she lost
entry.summary:
Author: Ppm

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 49,333Chapters: 17/27Kudos: 1,354

Summary: Having a "lost and found" soulmate was annoying to Damian. He never knew what to do with the 27 of the same pink color pencils she somehow kept losing or when the next needle would prick him. But after spending years and years with her as a soulmate, he somehow grew to accept her as she was.So when Damian found two mysterious boxes one night, he didn't care too much about them.Never once had he thought that it would be magical artifacts.He also never once thought it would be the last thing she lost before she died.

entry.title: Daminette in the wasteland
entry.summary:
Author: Ladybugrules

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 9,224Chapters: 4/?Kudos: 12

Summary: October 27th, 2077, was the day the world ended when nuclear bombs dropped, turning through the world into a wasteland, but for Marinette and Damian, their world changed when they entered Vault 111 after they saw a Nuclear cloud in the distance. So, after 200 years, they emerged from the vault where they rebuilt or tried to rebuild civilization, but with factions fighting with each other. Marinette and Damian have a hard time on their hands, but at least they have each other with them.It will contain Daminette smut in every chapter

entry.title: Angels Don't Always Come From the Sky
entry.summary:
Author: MiraculouslyCurious

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 12,755Chapters: 10/?Kudos: 1,690

Summary: When Marinette’s class heads to Gotham — the city known for its shadows and secrets — she’s faced with more than just a school trip. Balancing her life as Ladybug, unraveling Lila’s tangled web of lies, and managing the pull of a certain boy she can’t stop thinking about, Marinette discovers that sometimes the hardest battles are the ones of the heart. In the end, it’s a delicate mix of fate, chance, and a little bit of luck that will decide where she’s headed.

entry.title: Scars Cut Deeper Than Wounds [Rewritten]
entry.summary:
Author: TerressaWinner

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 33,733Chapters: 15/?Kudos: 314

Summary: Marinette has a dark past she's not willing to share with anyone. One so dark that she has to move away from the hubble and bubble of Paris to the dark streets of Gotham. She roams around until she is met by a walking, talking traffic light and taken in by a dark haired rich man. Everything goes well until a secret is discovered that soon leads to many others being brought to light.... Join me as I venture into the mind of one very anxious superhero in the rewritten version of one of my best fanfics: Scars Cut Deeper Than Wounds.
